title: Angola: Filda2015 - Oil Sector Pledges Permanent Research, Production Projects
text:
Kenya: U.S. to Give Sh101 Billion Fund for Women Centres in Kenya, Zambia, Mali - Obama 
"These projects will give assurance to maintain the production levels set out in the State Budget," he said. 
He also stressed the importance of the companies operating in the country to adapt to the current reality. 
According to him, oil production is a cyclical business that also require to face the less good times". 
As for the resumption of production at Natural Liquefied Gas Project, Angola LNG, the official 
said the information from the companies of the consortium suggest that the project may restart in the last quarter of this year. 
According to him, the consolidation in terms of regular and ongoing operation of the Angola LNG project is expected to happen in the first quarter of next year. 
Angola LNG company is a partnership between the Oil firms Sonangol, Chevron, BP, ENI and Total. 
It has the capacity to produce about 5.2 million tons of liquefied natural gas a year. Angola
